C

calculateDimensions(Graphics2D) - Method in class dillon.gameAPI.gui.BasicDialog
This method finds the dimensions for the two boxes.
Camera - Class in dillon.gameAPI.scroller
This object tells the Scroll manager where the camera is so it can render the correct tiles.
Camera() - Constructor for class dillon.gameAPI.scroller.Camera
 
checkCollision() - Method in class dillon.gameAPI.entity.Entity
This method will check if the player is colliding with anything.
clearBlackout() - Static method in class dillon.gameAPI.gui.guiManager
Deprecated.
This cancels the blackout.
ClientConnector - Class in dillon.gameAPI.networking
This class bridges the gap between the central server and the client, from the server to client.
ClientConnector(Socket) - Constructor for class dillon.gameAPI.networking.ClientConnector
Creates a client connector with the specified socket.
connect(String, int) - Static method in class dillon.gameAPI.networking.NetworkConnection
Tells the engine to connect to a server.
connect(InetSocketAddress) - Static method in class dillon.gameAPI.networking.NetworkConnection
Connects to a server, using the Inet socket address.
Core - Class in dillon.gameAPI.core
Core file that has starting and stopping methods.
Core() - Constructor for class dillon.gameAPI.core.Core
 
crash(Exception) - Static method in class dillon.gameAPI.core.Core
This method shuts off the event system and activates CanvasController's Crash to stop the engine.
